sentence: Ecolab Inc. ( ECL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on March 07, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.275 per share is scheduled to be paid on April 15, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased ECL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 19.57% increase over the same period a year ago.
The previous trading day's last sale of ECL was $109.38, representing a -0.56% decrease from the 52 week high of $110 and a 41.48% increase over the 52 week low of $77.31.
ECL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
ECL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.15.
Zacks Investment Research reports ECL's forecasted earnings growth in 2014 as 17.87%, compared to an industry average of 11.2%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the ECL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
